match.title: 1st ODI
match.statusText: West Indies won by 6 wickets (with 84 balls remaining)

milestones.description: Viv Richards's 119 is the highest individual score in ODIs (for WI), surpassing Fredericks's 105
Viv Richards has broken the record for most runs in boundaries (86) in an innings in ODIs, going past Glenn Turner's 76
Viv Richards has broken the record for most runs in boundaries (86) in an innings in ODIs for WI, going past Alvin Kallicharran's 62
Greenidge has broken the record for most sixes (4) in ODIs for WI, going past Clive Lloyd's 3
Julien has become the top wicket-taker for WI in ODIs with 14 wickets, going past Keith Boyce's 13
This is the highest match aggregate (409) involving teams England & West Indies in ODIs
Fredericks has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (9) for WI, going past Keith Boyce
Constant has broken the record for officiating the most ODIs (8) as an umpire, going past Dickie Bird
